revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/Marco Papavero|Marco Papavero]] ([[User talk:Marco Papavero|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:Omega|Omega]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-878 |revision=A1 |series=AC1900 |asin=B06XGB3X7R |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE (T&W) |manuf_model=AP-MTKH7 |manuf_rev=-0002 |fcc_date=04/10/2017 |fcc_id=KA2IR878A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR878A1 |pcb_id=AP-MTKH7-0002 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT;MEDIATEK, MT7621AT, 1634-AMTH, CTPA9A64, DTPAWB50; |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12805D |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1634-BFSL, ACMSWLQL; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1634-BFSL, ACMSWLQL; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |addl_chips=5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4552;Q, 4552, 39PF;4; |flags=MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 5.0.0.0; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt, |default_ssid=dlink-XXXX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1900 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://us.dlink.com/en/products/dir-878-d-link-wifi-router-ac1900-mu-mimo}} {{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DIR-878}} "AP-MTKH7-0002 REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. * Web GUI: http://dlinkrouter.local Despite being labeled as an AC1900 router, this device appears to be identical :to the AC2600 [[D-Link DIR-882 rev A1]] aside from the USB ports. D-Link claims only 1300/600Mbps speeds but also claims that it supports four streams. :The hardware is capable of four streams. ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33144-d-link-dir-882-ac2600-mu-mimo-wi-fi-router-reviewed ''D-Link DIR-882'' review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (includes a response :from D-Link confirming AC2600 support in the DIR-878 hardware). ===See also=== *[[D-Link DIR-867 rev A1]] • AP-MTKH7-0002 *[[D-Link DIR-878 rev A1]] • AP-MTKH7-0002 *[[D-Link DIR-882 rev A1]] • AP-MTKH7-0002 *[[D-Link DIR-1760 rev A1]] • AP-MTKH7-0002 *[[D-Link DIR-1960 rev A1]] • AP-MTKH7-0002 *[[D-Link DIR-2660 rev A1]] • AP-MTKH7-002 *[[Motorola MR1700]] • AP-MTKH7-0003 *[[Motorola MR2600]] • AP-MTKH7-0002 ====Devices==== {{#ask: [[Embedded system type::+]] [[Brand::~*]] [[Model::DIR-867||DIR-878||DIR-882||DIR-1760||DIR-1960||DIR-2640||DIR-2660||MR1700||MR2600]] [[Supported 802dot11 protocols::~*]] |?Embedded system type |?Supported 802dot11 protocols |?Manuf |?FCC ID |?CPU1 brand |?CPU1 model |?CPU1 clock speed |?FLA1 amount |?RAM1 amount |?WI1 chip1 brand |?WI1 chip1 model |?WI1 MIMO config |?WI1 802dot11 protocols |?WI2 chip1 brand |?WI2 chip1 model |?WI2 MIMO config |?WI2 802dot11 protocols |?Switch model |?LAN speed |?Expansion IFs |?USB ports |?LAN ports |?WAN ports |?FCC approval date#ISO |?Estimated date of release#ISO |?ASIN |?Wi-Fi certification ID |?WI1 antenna connector |?WI2 antenna connector |?Country of manufacture |?Has images |?WI1 module IF |?WI1 module |?WI2 module IF |?WI2 module |?Third party firmware supported |?Stock bootloader/full |?Stock firmware OS/full |?CPU1 cores |?Switch brand |?SATA ports |?Manuf product model |?WI2 MIMO config |?Series |format=template |introtemplate=Template:ES table intro NC2 |template=Template:ES table entry NC2 |outrotemplate=Template:GenTableOutro |limit=500 |link=all |sort=Page name |headers=show |searchlabel=… further results |class=sortable wikitable smwtable }} __NOTOC__
